<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"> <catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog> <applies_extended>false</applies_extended> <applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item> <applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task> <applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record> <applies_to>item</applies_to> <cat_item display_value="Name card">5129e80d4785711021f49128436d43fd</cat_item> <cat_variable/> <condition/> <description/> <field/> <global>true</global> <isolate_script>true</isolate_script> <messages/> <name>submit</name> <order/> <script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
var con = g_form.getValue('u_confirm');
if (!g_form.ajaxComplete) { check(); return false; }
function check() { if (con == "false") { g_form.addErrorMessage("ไม่สามารถสมัครสมาชิกได้"); }else{ g_form.ajaxComplete = true; g_form.submit(); } }
}]]></script> <sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-09-11 04:34:26</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>f5492bcc475d711021f49128436d437c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>submit</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Car parking reservation" source="x_950909_car_park">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Car parking reservation">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f5492bcc475d711021f49128436d437c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-11 08:08:58</sys_updated_on> <table/> <type>onSubmit</type> <ui_type>10</ui_type> <variable_set/> <view/> </catalog_script_client> </record_update>
